Detailed Description

MGIgesPD143 is the class for Iges parameter data type 143(Bounded Surface).

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Member Function Documentation

void MGIgesPD143::write_out_into_string ( const MGIgesGSec &  gsec,
MGPvector< std::string > &  plines 
) const [virtual]

Write out this PD as MGIgesParamLine's(into plines).

Except for string data, one integer or double data is output into one MGIgesParamLine, not striding over more than one line. Only when string data is output(to Holleris string), the data may stride over more than one lines. plines[i] for 0<=i<plines.size() are valid.

Parameters:
gsec Input gsec to input delimeter_param and delimeter_record;
plines output plines.

Implements MGIgesPD.

Member Data Documentation

int MGIgesPD143::m_type

The type of bounded surface representation:

=0: the boundary entities shall reference only model space. =1: The boundary entities shall reference both model space curve and the associated parameter space curve collections.
